description:
Call U.S. phones for FREE with Freetone: get your own real U.S. number and start calling! Freetone is the only free calling app for UNLIMITED calls & texts to ALL real U.S. phone numbers. No trials, no hidden costs, absolutely FREE!

Invite your family & friends to Freetone and make unlimited free calls anywhere in the US. Enjoy FREE CALLS and FREE VIDEO CALLS with your Freetone contacts on Apple iOS and other platforms. Send messages and voice notes, share photos and videos with your contacts easily for FREE with Freetone.

Turn your iPhone, iPad, and/or iPod Touch into a virtual phone with a real U.S. number. Freetone uses WiFi to provide free online calling, and if you already use 3G, 4G, or LTE data on the go, your new phone number is available 24/7. Beat the roaming costs when travelling, with Freetone, and communicate freely with everyone.

Contrary to similar apps, you do not have to pay anything or earn credits to call any U.S. number, whether they use the same app as you do or not. Watch out for their fine print; Freetone charges you nothing to make phone calls to US phones, landline and cellular.

What makes Freetone different?
•	 FREE own private number for your smartphone and tablet
•	 FREE calls to all U.S. phone numbers, independent of area or carrier
•	 FREE texts (real SMS messages) to all U.S. phones

•	 EASY to sign up using your email, or with your Facebook or Google account
•	 EASY to access your account across all mobile devices
•	 EASY to invite friends & family for free calls anywhere in the world

•	 BETTER calling quality and network speed among VoIP providers 
•	 BETTER battery usage for maximum battery efficiency
•	 BETTER than Skype, Viber, Hangouts, Pinger, Talkatone and other calling apps*

Why is Freetone the ultimate free calling app:
•	 Sign up with your email or simply with your Google account or your Facebook account
•	 Get your own unique Freetone phone number when you sign up
•	 Place and receive calls from your own Freetone phone number
•	 Receive and send text messages (SMS) from your own Freetone number
•	 Easily find your Facebook friends on Freetone
•	 Talk freely with contacts in your Google Plus circles
•	 Reach your extended network such as your LinkedIn connections at no cost
•	 Enjoy Freetone’s exclusive high speed VoIP technology with your private online phone
•	 Enjoy Free HD Voice and Video Calls to other Freetone app users 
•	 Record and send high quality voice notes to your friends
•	 Send and receive large pictures & videos from your iPhone/iPad/iTouch to any device
•	 Enjoy group texting features & share text, photos and videos easily with your friends 
• 	Get notified when your message is delivered and read by your friend
• 	Stay online with active push notifications and never miss an important text
•	 Invite your friends to via email or share using other apps

* Freetone is better than other calling apps, because:
•	 Unlike the Skype app, you do not have to pay for calling real numbers in the US
•	 Unlike the Viber app, your contact does not have to be a Viber user for you to be able to call them for free
• 	Unlike the Hangouts app, you do not need to have a Google account to sign up
•	 Unlike the Pinger app, you do not have to earn credits to make phone calls to the US
•	 Unlike the Talkatone app, you do not have to buy new outbound minutes for unlimited calling

Freetone offers you the ultimate high quality online calling experience as the best FREE Internet phone available for iPhone and iPad. Unlike other free phone apps, you do not need to earn or pay for calling credits. It is the cheapest option among many online calling apps because all you need is an Internet connection. Freetone uses VoIP technology over WiFi to connect you with real phones. Simply call any US phone number for free, whether your friend owns a landline, cellphone or a smartphone.

-Limitations apply
-Subject to Freetone’s Terms and Conditions

Help us improve Freetone: http://textme.zendesk.com
trackCensoredName: FreeTone - Free Calls and Texting for iPhone, iPod and iPad

releaseNotes:
• Go TextMe International becomes FreeTone with this update
• Free unlimited calls & texts to any US phone number
• Brand new call interface and dialer
• Callheads – message while you talk!
• Optimized for iOS 8
• Optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
